lines.text: He's always looking at the good side of people.
Yeah, but while he's looking at their good side, their bad side is gonna finish him.

[singing]
Something good is bound to happen when love is in your heart/For love and human kindness is where good things always start/There's goodness in your neighbor/There's goodness close at hand/Oh let's spread love and kindness throughout all this blessed land!
I don't NEED no spittin' image!
